title: Home
description: The Magic Home, the fourth book in the acclaimed Magic Thief series, finds new wizard Conn back where he startedâ€”accused of being a thief.Despite successfully securing a balance between the competing magics of Wellmet, Conn is not happy. Duchess Rowan has promoted him to ducal magister, but the other wizards see him only as a thief.But something sinister is brewing, as magicians' locus stones are being stolen and magical spells are going awry. As Conn faces old enemies and powerful magical forces, is he strong enough to save the city he calls home?Diana Wynne Jones, author of Howl's Moving Castle, praised this middle grade fantasy series filled with magic and wonder, saying of the first "I couldn't put it down. Wonderful, exciting stuff."
author: Sarah Prineas
